faqs.question: What types of training do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a range of training formats including interactive workshops, hands-on coding sessions, mentoring programs, and self-paced learning materials. Our training covers technical topics (React, Next.js, TypeScript, etc.), methodologies (Agile, DevOps), and soft skills for digital teams.

faqs.question: How is your consulting approach different?
faqs.answer: Our consulting focuses on knowledge transfer and building internal capabilities, not creating dependency. We work collaboratively with your team, sharing our expertise while ensuring your organization develops the skills to succeed independently in the long term.

faqs.question: Can you customize training for our specific needs?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We tailor all training programs to your team's current skill level, specific technologies, and business context. We can use your actual projects as training examples to make the learning immediately applicable to your work.

faqs.question: How long do consulting engagements typically last?
faqs.answer: Engagements vary widely based on your needs. We offer everything from short-term assessments (1-2 weeks) to embedded consulting (3-6 months) and ongoing advisory relationships. We're flexible and can adjust our involvement as your needs evolve.
